abstract: Verizon Wireless will pay up to $90 million to 15 million cellphone customers who were wrongly charged, one of the largest-ever refunds by a telecommunications company.
snippet: Verizon Wireless will pay up to $90 million to 15 million cellphone customers who were wrongly charged, one of the largest-ever refunds by a telecommunications company.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON  Verizon Wireless said on Sunday that it would pay up to $90 million in refunds to 15 million cellphone customers who were wrongly charged for data sessions or Internet use, one of the largest customer refunds by a telecommunications company.

headline.main: Verizon Wireless to Pay Millions in Refunds
headline.print_headline: Verizon Wireless to Pay Millions in Refunds for Data Charges
